text:
Trending on Billboard

Nicki Minaj has proven herself to be the queen of outrageous, dynamic, and fearless fashion. Her extreme outfits and gravity-defying wigs have snatched the attention of many. In fact, the singer is so in touch with fashion she raps about Anna Wintour and Oscar de la Renta in her new song ‘Come on a Cone.’ While listening to her new jam, check out our picks of her most outrageous and fantastically twisted fashions. Get ready to be astonished by clashing colors, dyed hair, and pompom balls.

Nicki Minaj has proven herself to be the queen of outrageous, dynamic, and fearless fashion. Her extreme outfits and gravity-defying wigs have snatched the attention of many. In fact, the singer is so in touch with fashion she raps about Anna Wintour and Oscar de la Renta in her new song 'Come on a Cone.' While listening to her new jam, check out our picks of her most outrageous and fantastically twisted fashions. Get ready to be astonished by clashing colors, dyed hair, and pompom balls.

1909859-nicki-minaj-outrageous-fashion-600 Nicki Minaj has proven herself to be the queen of outrageous, dynamic, and fearless fashion. Her extreme outfits and gravity-defying wigs have snatched the attention of many. In fact, the singer is so in touch with fashion she raps about Anna Wintour and Oscar de la Renta in her new song ‘Come on a Cone.’ While listening to her new jam, check out our picks of her most outrageous and fantastically twisted fashions. Get ready to be astonished by clashing colors, dyed hair, and pompom balls.

1886909-nicki-minaj-worst-dressed-mtv-vmas-617-600 At the MTV Video Music Awards at Nokia Theatre L.A. LIVE on Aug. 28, 2011 in Los Angeles, Nicki rocked a chaotic Gareth Pugh mirrored assemble. The hectic and Japanese-inspired look — complete with a cartoon-patterned face mask — did have a hint of sweetness to it with an ice cream pendant necklace and cotton candy inspired hair ‘do.

1886899-nicki-minaj-tokyo-airport-617-600 Nicki shows off her love of Japanese streetwear as she arrives at Narita International Airport on March 20, 2012 in Narita, Japan rocking an electric green with, pink Adidas trousers, and denim Jeremy Scott for Adidas kicks.

1886869-nicki-minaj-performing-ama-2011-617-600 Nicki channels her inner fembot as she performs at the 2011 American Music Awards held at Nokia Theatre L.A. LIVE on Nov. 20, 2011 in Los Angeles in metal bondage gear and a pink wig.

Blending the hair of Marge Simpson in the form of a pink wig, and a jazzy 80’s patterned jumpsuit that looks like it is hot off the set of The Fresh Prince of Bel-Air, Nicki was spotted leaving her hotel on Jan. 20, 2011 in London.

1886859-nicki-minaj-performing-617-600 Performing on the “I’m Still Music Tour” at Honda Center on April 23, 2011 in Anaheim, Calif. Nicki appeared to have tasted the rainbow, and by the looks of her outfit, she liked it.

1886839-nicki-minaj-Luxy-Nightclub-617-600 Ms. Minaj Hosts “Super Bass” At Luxy Nightclub on August 14, 2011 in Toronto looking causal, well that is casual for Nicki. The rapper rocked a leopard jacket, yellow T-shirt, matching yellow nails, and a blonde wig. Meow!

1886789-nicki-minaj-grammys-2012-red-carpet-617-600 The multi-faceted star sought fashion inspiration in the Vatican for the 54th Grammy Awards in Los Angeles, Feb. 12, 2012. Minaj made her way down the carpet in a red nun-like Versace ensemble with the Pope dangling on her arm.

1886779-nicki-minaj-grammys-617-600 Blending the fierceness of a lioness with the freakishness of the bride of Frankenstein, Minaj arrived for the 53rd Annual Grammy Awards at the Staples Center in Los Angeles on Feb. 13, 2011. The rapper rocked a Cheetah print “vintage” Givenchy Haute Couture bubble dress from the Fall 2007 show and looked like she was ready to pounce on someone. Roar!

1886769-nicki-minaj-fashion-week-front-row-617-600 Looking like a Muppet was slaughtered all over her, Nicki Minaj attended the Carolina Herrera Spring 2012 fashion show during Mercedes-Benz Fashion Week at The Theater at Lincoln Center on Sept. 12, 2011 in New York City. The rap diva was covered in multicolored pompom balls and neon green mesh leggings. Her not so subdued look was topped off with a platinum blonde beehive wig and electric pink socks and matching lipstick.

1886719-nicki-minaj-casio-event-617-600 The bride of Frankenstein has returned. Ms. Minaj strutted down the red carpet at the launch of the Casio New TRYX digital camera at Best Buy Theater on April 7, 2011 in New York City in a multicolored Jeremy Scott leather outfit, and a platinum blonde Afro wig.

1886739-nicki-minaj-chicken-wing-necklace-617-600 Nicki poses in the portrait studio at the iHeartRadio Music Festival held at the MGM Grand Garden Arena on Sept. 24, 2011 in Las Vegas in a lavender and silver bustier-topped tutu, tights patterned with the solar system and a pink fried chicken necklace. Hungry?

Appearing at ‘VH1 Divas Salute the Troops’ presented by the USO at the MCAS Miramar on Dec. 3, 2010 in Miramar, Calif., Nicki looked like she just hopped out of the pages of a comic book. The singer shook up the stadium in a curly pink wig, red and blue graphic dress and matching mint-green leggings and killer heels.

1886709-nicki-minaj-billboard-music-awards-617-600 Nicki appears more angelic than usual as she arrives at the 2011 Billboard Music Awards held at the MGM Grand on May 22, 2011 in Las Vegas, Nevada in a pale blue figure hugging Mark Fast bodysuit and white Versace heels.

1886699-nicki-minaj-Betsey-Johnson-fashion-show-617-600 Sitting front row at Betsey Johnson’s Spring 2012 fashion show during Mercedes-Benz Fashion Week at The Theater at Lincoln Center on September 12, 2011 in New York City our outrageous fashion darling rocked a larger then life blue wig, oversized delicious purple pretzel necklace and customized platform shoes.

1886679-nicki-minaj-bet-awards-2012-red-carpet-617-600 Here comes the carrot-topped bride. Ms. Minaj arrives at the 2010 BET Awards held at the Shrine Auditorium on June 27, 2010 in Los Angeles looking virginal yet spicy. The rapper accepted three awards that night all while stunning in a billowing white Rochas dress, paired with a chunky chandelier necklace, and bright orange wig.

1886669-nicki-minaj-ama-617-600 Come on Barbie (or in this case, Nicki) let’s go party! Minaj attended the 2011 American Music Awards Nominees Press Conference at JW Marriott Los Angeles at L.A. LIVE on Oct. 11, 2011 looking like a life size Barbie. The Malibu Barbie look took shape with a Cia.Maritima’s Mandala twisted bandeau top, matching skirt, and all polished of with a blue and blonde wig.

1893709-nicki-minaj-h-m-versace-617-600 Wearing custom Versace, complete with palm leaves in her green weave, Nicki attended the Versace for H&M Fashion event at the H&M on the Hudson on Nov. 8, 2011 in NYC.

1893719-nicki-minaj-victoria-secret-show-617-600 Meet the pop superwoman! Nicki performed during the 2011 Victoria’s Secret Fashion Show at the Lexington Avenue Armory on Nov. 9, 2011 in New York City looking like a modern day superhero. The rapper danced around the runway in a orange bustier, pop art printed peplum skirt and leggings, disco ball shoulder pads, metallic Giuseppe Zanotti kicks, and pink wig.

1893699-nicki-minaj-new-years-eve-nye-617-600 Nicki travels to Mars. Minaj performed on Dick Clark’s New Year’s Rockin’ Eve at Los Angeles Center Studios looking like she hailed from out of this world in an electric blue ensemble and disco ball covered planets on her shoulder.

1911259-nicki-minaj-outrageous-fashion-rip-the-runway-600 Nicki sported this black and white topographical bodysuit with vulturey shoulder pads during BET’s Rip The Runway 2010 on February 27th in New York.

1893689-nicki-minaj-will-i-am-performance-617-600 Nicki was caught in a purple rainstorm as she arrived at the 2010 MTV Video Music Awards held at Nokia Theatre on Sept. 12, 2010 in Los Angeles in a purple spandex bodysuit and pink wig.

Nicki wore this layered Christian Siriano gown (also featured in Taylor Swift’s Wonderstruck Perfume print ad)for her performance on SNL on January 29th, 2012 in New York.

1893679-nicki-minaj-birthday-party-tao-617-600 Celebrating her 26th birthday at TAO Las Vegas on December 9, 2010, Nicki rocked a pearl-encrusted bodysuit with rhinestone saturated platform heels. Diamonds are a girl’s best friend!

1893669-nicki-minaj-american-music-awards-ama-617-600 Nicki made her way down the red carpet at the 2010 American Music Awards on Nov. 21, 2010 in Los Angeles in a neon-embellished dress by Indian designer Manish Arora. She jazzed up her look even more with green dip-dyed hair and pink and gold strappy sandals.

1893659-nicki-minaj-nickelodeon-kids-awards-2012-617-600 The “Starships” hitmaker looked good enough to eat at Nickelodeon’s 25th Annual Kids’ Choice Awards held at Galen Center on March 31, 2012 in Los Angeles. Dressed as a human popcorn and gumball machine, Minaj looked absolutely delicious and polished off her yummy ensemble with a custom-made pair of teddy bear shoes by Onch from Onch.

Nicki Minaj has proven herself to be the queen of outrageous, dynamic, and fearless fashion. Her extreme outfits and gravity-defying wigs have snatched the attention of many. In fact, the singer is so in touch with fashion she raps about Anna Wintour and Oscar de la Renta in her new song ‘Come on a Cone.’ While listening to her new jam, check out our picks of her most outrageous and fantastically twisted fashions. Get ready to be astonished by clashing colors, dyed hair, and pompom balls.
